Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: Maintenance of human bladder tumor assembloids were conducted in organoid media.  Organoid media: Advanced DMEM/F-12 (Gibco) supplemented with 10 mM HEPES (pH 7.4, Sigma), 10 mM Nicotinamide (Sigma), 1 mM N-acetyl-L-cysteine (Sigma), 1X Glutamax (Gibco), 1% penicillin/streptomycin (Gibco), 50 ng/ml human EGF (Peprotech), 0.5X B-27 (Gibco), 1 μM A83-01 (Tocris), and 10 μM Y-27632 (Abmole)
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: We lysed 50,000 cells with 50 μl of Lysis buffer (10 mM Tris-Cl pH 7.4, 10 mM NaCl, 3 mM MgCl2, 0.1% NP-40, 0.1% Tween-20, and 0.01% Triton X-100) and incubated them for 5 min on ice . Following centrifuging at 1,000 g for 10 min at 4 °C, we resuspended the nuclei pellets with 50 μl of transposition mix (25 μl 2X TD buffer (20 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.6, 10 mM MgCl2, and 20% Dimethyl Formamide in sterile water) and 2.5 μl transposase (100 nM final), 16.5 μl PBS, 0.01% Triton X-100, 0.1% Tween-20, and 5 μl H2O) and incubated the mixture with shaking for 1 h at 55 °C in a thermomixer. We purified transposed DNA using DNA Clean and the Concentrator-5 Kit (Zymo Research)., We amplified the transposed DNA using the NEBNext® High-Fidelity 2X PCR Master Mix for 10 cycles. We then performed ATAC-Seq using the Illumina HiSeq 2500 platform.

Organoid media: Advanced DMEM/F-12 (Gibco) supplemented with 10 mM HEPES (pH 7.4, Sigma), 10 mM Nicotinamide (Sigma), 1 mM N-acetyl-L-cysteine (Sigma), 1X Glutamax (Gibco), 1% penicillin/streptomycin (Gibco), 50 ng/ml human EGF (Peprotech), 0.5X B-27 (Gibco), 1 μM A83-01 (Tocris), and 10 μM Y-27632 (Abmole)
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: We lysed 50,000 cells with 50 μl of Lysis buffer (10 mM Tris-Cl pH 7.4, 10 mM NaCl, 3 mM MgCl2, 0.1% NP-40, 0.1% Tween-20, and 0.01% Triton X-100) and incubated them for 5 min on ice . Following centrifuging at 1,000 g for 10 min at 4 °C, we resuspended the nuclei pellets with 50 μl of transposition mix (25 μl 2X TD buffer (20 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.6, 10 mM MgCl2, and 20% Dimethyl Formamide in sterile water) and 2.5 μl transposase (100 nM final), 16.5 μl PBS, 0.01% Triton X-100, 0.1% Tween-20, and 5 μl H2O) and incubated the mixture with shaking for 1 h at 55 °C in a thermomixer. We purified transposed DNA using DNA Clean and the Concentrator-5 Kit (Zymo Research)., We amplified the transposed DNA using the NEBNext® High-Fidelity 2X PCR Master Mix for 10 cycles. We then performed ATAC-Seq using the Illumina HiSeq 2500 platform.
Sample_data_processing: FastQC-0.11.5 checked the quality of raw sequences. cutadapt-1.18 was used to detect and remove Illumina adapter sequence., Bowtie2-2.3.4.1 aligned sequences to the Homo sapiens genome (Ensembl GRCh38 release97). QualiMap-2.2.1 checked the quality of the alignment., Picard tools removed duplicates with parameters "VALIDATION_STRINGENCY, The reads were offset by +4 bases for the + strand and -5 bases for the - strand., MACS2-v2.1.2 was used for peak calling with parameters "--nomodel --shift -100 --extsize 200" and q-value < 0.01.
